!Beast Herder Tunatun: Mighty kind of you. Tell you what... I’ll pay you for killing those Sel Mahum Farm Ravagers or Farm Bandits on my farm. I wish I could take your word for it, but I’m gonna need to see some proof before I pay you. Collect 300 Sel Mahum Manes and bring them back as proof. A word of warning though... some Sel Mahum can’t grow Manes, so it might take you some time before you find one that does. Best of luck, stranger.
